title: Photo of young Tim Duncan, Chris Paul featured by SI Vault

Kin Man Hui/Express-News Spurs' Tim Duncan (21) debates a call with Los Angeles Clippers' Chris Paul (03) and Randy Foye (04) in the second half of game four of the Western Conference semifinals at the Staples Center in Los Angeles on ... more Image 10 of 12 Spurs' Danny Green (04) and Tim Duncan (21) keeps defensive pressure on Los Angeles Clippers' Chris Paul (03) in the fourth quarter of game four of the Western Conference semifinals at the Staples Center in Los Angeles on Sunday, May 20, 2012. Spurs defeated Clippers 102-99. Kin Man Hui/Express-News Spurs' Danny Green (04) and Tim Duncan (21) keeps defensive pressure on Los Angeles Clippers' Chris Paul (03) in the fourth quarter of game four of the Western Conference semifinals at the Staples Center in Los ... more Image 11 of 12 San Antonio Spurs Tim Duncan (21) reaches out to try and block a shot by Los Angeles Clippers Chris Paul (03), during the second half of game three of the Western Conference semifinals at Staples Center in Los Angeles, Saturday, May 19, 2012. Spurs defeated the Clippers, 96-86. Jerry Lara/San Antonio Express-News (San Antonio Express-News) San Antonio Spurs Tim Duncan (21) reaches out to try and block a shot by Los Angeles Clippers Chris Paul (03), during the second half of game three of the Western Conference semifinals at Staples Center in Los ... more Image 12 of 12 Photo of young Tim Duncan, Chris Paul featured by SI Vault 1 / 12 Back to Gallery Tuesday, the Sports Illustrated Vault released a throwback picture featuring a young Tim Duncan and an adolescent Chris Paul.
Duncan attended Wake Forest from 1993-1997, Paul from 2003-2005.
Paul is nine years Duncan's junior, and you can tell from the picture that the kid who would one day be known as "CP3" is years away from claiming that moniker.
Remarkably — or not, given what we now know about Duncan's Wolverine-like aging process — Timmy still looks essentially the same, save for spots of gray he's developed in recent years.
Chris Paul grew up in Clemens, North Carolina, roughly 20 minutes away from the Wake Forest campus.
We don't know the full story behind the photo, but who knows, maybe a young Paul sneaked over to hoop with the big man on campus?
Knowing Paul's tenacity and competitive drive, it wouldn't be too shocking.
All these years later the men remain friends, even sharing an emotional embrace after Paul sank a game-winner over Duncan in Game 7 of last year's playoffs.

It’s young Chris Paul and old Tim Duncan. pic.twitter.com/AyrCbrebPS
